Issue.creator: muralisr
Issue.summary: set MSPCONFIGPATH to fabric default sampleconfig
Issue.description: {{mspConfigPath: /etc/hyperledger/fabric/msp/sampleconfig}} in core.yaml is causing grief to non-docker users who have to override this everytime. It is better to change standard docker-compose files to point to docker path than have users change the config every time (in core.yaml or as an ENV var)
